v1.0 (build )
Copyright \u00a9 2016 hiTour.

v2.0.1
Initial release of v2, fully re-built with many improvements, including more efficient network usage and an updated design.

Libraries

The Unitu Android app uses the following 3rd party libraries, resources and tools:
- Android Volley
- Font Awesome
- Intercom
- Joda Time
- Retrolambda
